thread.title: Donald and Melania Trump’s First Dance as First Couple of America
thread.title_full: Donald and Melania Trump’s First Dance as First Couple of America

author: Justin Baragona
title: Donald and Melania Trump’s First Dance as First Couple of America
text:
Donald and Melania Trump’s First Dance as First Couple of America   9:55   
During the one of the three inaugural balls they were scheduled to attend this evening, the 45th President of the United States, Donald Trump , danced with the nation’s new First Lady, Melania Trump . 
In one of the grand traditions of the presidential inauguration, the Trumps had their first dance as America’s First Couple. However, before taking the dance floor, the new POTUS addressed the crowd, telling the audience that he “respects” that people that didn’t like him very much told him he had done a really good job with the inauguration. 
He also remarked about how they did something “very special” while praising his running mate, Vice-President Mike Pence. That was followed by a “Make America Great Again!” 
The couple proceeded to cut a rug to the strains of ‘My Way,’ a song made famous by Frank Sinatra and apparently one of Trump’s very favorites. Pence and his wife Karen then joined in, followed by Trump’s grown children and spouses. The song was sung by Erin Boheme, Nickie Conley and Jason Eskridge . 
Watch the video above.
